pullRequest.body:
This PR introduces the notion of wide subcategory. The API is in parallel with that of full subcategories. 

---

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10212889330/job/28257178580)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10212889330/job/28257179123)

`IsMultiplicative` is a type-class:
```suggestion
    [IsMultiplicative P]
```
great! This shortened `InducedWideCategory D F P hP` to `InducedWideCategory D F P` all throughout the file.
and shortened `WideSubcategory P hP` to `WideSubcategory P`.

```suggestion
in `D` from `F X` to `F Y` which satisfy a property `P : MorphismProperty D` that is multiplicative.
```

It does not seem to be that any data is forgotten.
```suggestion
/-- The forgetful functor from an induced wide category to the original category. -/
```

What about making `id_def` and `comp_def` simp lemmas instead?
```suggestion
```

```suggestion
instance wideSubcategory.faithful : (wideSubcategoryInclusion P).Faithful :=
  inferInstanceAs (wideInducedFunctor WideSubcategory.obj P).Faithful
```

```suggestion
    (wideSubcategoryInclusion P).map f = f.1 :=
```

```suggestion
theorem wideSubcategoryInclusion.obj (X) : (wideSubcategoryInclusion P).obj X = X.obj :=
```

```suggestion
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(CategoryTheory): wide subcategories
